name: Layout

fields.name: customButtons
fields.description: The custom buttons for this layout.

fields.name: customConsoleComponents
fields.description: Represents custom console components (Visualforce pages, lookup fields, or related lists) on a page layout.

fields.name: emailDefault
fields.description: Default value for the email checkbox. Only relevant if the showEmailCheckbox property is set.

fields.name: excludeButtons
fields.description: List of standard buttons to exclude from this layout.

fields.name: feedLayout
fields.description: Represents the values that define the feed view of a feed-based page layout.

fields.name: headers
fields.description: Represents the layout headers used for tagging.

fields.name: layoutSections
fields.description: The main sections of the layout containing fields, s-controls, and custom links. The order here determines the layout order.

fields.name: miniLayout
fields.description: Represents a minilayout, which is used in the mini view of a record in the Console tab, hover details, and event overlays.

fields.name: multilineLayoutFields
fields.description: Fields for special multiline layout fields which appear in OpportunityProduct layouts.

fields.name: platformActionList
fields.description: The list of actions, and their order, that display in the Salesforce mobile action bar for the layout.

fields.name: quickActionList
fields.description: The list of quick actions that display in the full Salesforce site for the page layout.

fields.name: relatedContent
fields.description: The Related Content section of the page layout.

fields.name: relatedLists
fields.description: The related lists for the layout, listed in the order they appear in the user interface.

fields.name: relatedObjects
fields.description: The list of related objects that appears in the mini view of the console.

fields.name: runAssignmentRulesDefault
fields.description: Default value for the “run assignment rules” checkbox. Only relevant if the showRunAssignmentRulesCheckbox property is set.

fields.name: showEmailCheckbox
fields.description: Controls whether to show the email checkbox. Only allowed on Case, CaseClose, and Task layouts. The default state of checkbox is controlled by the emailDefault property.

fields.name: showHighlightsPanel
fields.description: If set, the highlights panel displays on pages in the Salesforce console.

fields.name: showInteractionLogPanel
fields.description: If set, the interaction log displays on pages in the Salesforce console.

fields.name: showKnowledgeComponent
fields.description: Only allowed on Case layouts. If set, the Knowledge sidebar displays on cases in the Salesforce console.

fields.name: showRunAssignmentRulesCheckbox
fields.description: Controls whether to show the Run Assignment Rules checkbox. Only allowed on Lead and Case layouts. The default state of checkbox is controlled by the runAssignmentRulesDefault property.

fields.name: showSolutionSection
fields.description: Only allowed on CaseClose layout. If set, the built-in solution information section shows up on the page.

fields.name: showSubmitAndAttachButton
fields.description: For Cast layouts only. If set, the Submit & Add Attachment button displays on case edit pages to portal users in the Customer Portal.

fields.name: summaryLayout
fields.description: The summary layout for this layout.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.Layout.

description: Represents the metadata associated with a page layout.
